title: "The Mind Reader: Alex's Journey into the Thoughts of Others"
premise: Alex wakes up one morning to find that he has an extraordinary ability - he can read minds. At first, he is terrified and confused by this new power, unable to comprehend how or why it has happened to him. As he struggles to make sense of his newfound ability, he discovers that he can not only read minds, but also influence them. But with great power comes great danger, and Alex finds himself in the middle of a complex web of secrets and lies as he tries to navigate his new reality.
